title: day for the purposes of the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 39 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 

(Appointed Day) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited water service (amendment) act 2022 (appointed day) order 2022

title: day for the purposes of the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 39 of
heading: 2. The 1st day of January 2023 is the day appointed to be the appointed
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of January 2023 is the day appointed to be the appointed 
day for the purposes of the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 39 of 
2022). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 December, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [682] 3
text_norm: 2 1st day january 2023 day appointed appointed day purpose water service (amendment) act 2022 (no 39 2022) given official seal 16 december 2022 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 20th december 2022 682 3

title: day for the purposes of the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 39 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 6(1) of the Water Services (Amendment) 
Act 2022 (No. 39 of 2022), this Order appoints 1 January 2023 as the 
Appointed Day for the purposes of the Act. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [682]
